title:
Contraction property of Fock type space of log-subharmonic functions in
  $\mathbb{R}^m$
abstract:
We prove a contraction property of Fock type spaces $\mathcal{L}_{\alpha}^p$
of log-subharmonic functions in $\mathbb{R}^n$. To prove the result, we
demonstrate a certain monotonic property of measures of the superlevel set of
the function $u(x) = |f(x)|^p e^{-\frac{\alpha}{2} p |x|^2}$, provided that $f$
is a certain log-subharmonic function in $\mathbb{R}^m$. The result recover a
contraction property of holomorphic functions in the Fock space
$\mathcal{F}_\alpha^p$ proved by Carlen in \cite{carlen}.
